mlraichle
=========

.. automodule:: src

:mod:`src` implements methods used in NIH program project grant 5P01NS080675-03, "Glucose Metabolism and the Default Mode Network in Health and Disease."



AugmentedAerobicGlycolysisKit
-----------------------------

The class implements top-level methods for computing aerobic glycolysis.

.. autoclass:: AugmentedAerobicGlycolysisKit
	:show-inheritance:
	:members:
	:undoc-members:
